function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compilation of subnational data on daily infection rates and policy deployments","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the spread and response to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive data collection and analysis, and improve policy response strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, policy evaluation tools","People":"General population, policymakers, public health professionals","Owner":"Public health agencies, government bodies"},{"Description":"Almost perfect exponential growth of COVID-19 infections due to susceptibility of populations","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 infections","Mitigation":"Implement widespread vaccination, public health education, and behavioral interventions","Technologies":"Vaccination technologies, public health education platforms","People":"General population, public health professionals","Owner":"Public health agencies, government bodies"},{"Description":"Variable rate of exponential growth influenced by policies and epidemiological factors","Impact":"Unpredictable and rapid changes in infection rates","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring, adaptive policy response, and public health education","Technologies":"Data monitoring technologies, policy evaluation tools, communication platforms","People":"General population, public health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, government bodies"}]}
